project_intro.title: Project Introduction
project_intro.description: TwinX is an AI-driven Web3 short video platform that integrates AI avatars and intelligent recommendations to create an immersive interactive and decentralized value system. Every expression and interaction will be authenticated on-chain, aiming to connect creators, users, brands, and developers to build a global content ecosystem

ai_flow.title: AI Avatar Generation Process
ai_flow.description: Users upload their social, chat, and media data to TwinX, which trains a vivid AI avatar that mimics their style for personalized interactions and content creation.

items.title: AI Creation · Efficient Generation
items.description: Rewarding creators, active users, and developers to enhance community interaction.

items.title: Avatar Interaction · 24/7 Online
items.description: Optimizing AI models and enhancing digital personas through user-platform interaction data.

items.title: Business Loop · Integrated Monetization
items.description: Distributing earnings fairly and transparently to ecosystem participants through TwinX.

items.title: Immersive Experience · Panoramic Integration
items.description: Incentivizing user growth through rewarded recommendations and interactions, enhancing platform attractiveness and attracting more users.

node.disclaimer_text:
The rights and earnings models of TwinX super nodes involved in this program are based on current development plans and market expectations. Participants should fully understand the following before joining the TwinX node system:

Non-Investment Commitment Statement: The TwinX Super Node Program does not constitute any form of investment advice or fundraising. The platform makes no promises or guarantees regarding token price fluctuations or potential economic returns.

Earnings Uncertainty: Node-related incentives (such as TXT airdrops, dividend mechanisms, governance rights, etc.) will be distributed according to the platform's actual operation, with the possibility of adjustments and delays.

Technical and Operational Risks: The TwinX platform involves cutting-edge technologies such as Web3 smart contracts, AI systems, and distributed storage, which may face system vulnerabilities, upgrade interruptions, algorithm changes, and other risks. The platform will continue to optimize but is not responsible for losses caused by force majeure or third-party events.

Voluntary Participation: Node participation is entirely based on personal judgment. Please participate rationally with a clear understanding of your risk tolerance.

Legal Compliance Statement: Policies and laws regarding crypto assets and Web3 projects vary by country. Please ensure that you understand and comply with the relevant laws and regulations of your country/region before participating in the TwinX node program.

The TwinX team reserves the right to dynamically adjust the super node program mechanisms, schedules, and rights details, and will announce them in advance through community and official channels. The final interpretation rights belong to the IAT Foundation.
